Detailed Description

CSoundPlayer class handles playback and stopping of a sound file.

CSoundPlayer class object is constructed when the opcode OPCODE_PLAYSOUND is received from the proxy. This class is responsible for playback and stopping of a sound file.

void CSoundPlayer::MapcPlayComplete (  TInt  aError  ) 
 

Callback from the MMdaAudioPlayerCallback.

This method is invoked when the playback of the sound file is completed.

Parameters:
aError as TInt. Represents the status of completion. Can represent an Error if the playback was not successful.

void CSoundPlayer::Play (   ) 
 

Starts playing the file.

This method sets the current state to EPlaying and starts the playback of the sound file.

void CSoundPlayer::Stop (   ) 
 

Stops playing the file.

This method stops playing the sound file and sets the current state to EReady.
